awd_titl_txt: Investigation of P-Odd and P, T-Odd Effects in Atomic       Thallium and Dysprosium (Physics)
awd_abstract_narration: An experiment to measure parity non-conservation in the                    6P1/2-7P1/2 transition in atomic thallium will be conducted and                 refined.  The objective is to observe this effect with sufficient               precision (~1% or better) to reveal the presence of a nuclear                   anapole moment in each naturally occurring thallium isotope:                    A=203 and A=205.  Research will also be carried out on P and P,T                odd effects in the rare earth dysprosium.  In order to determine                whether the proposed dysprosium experiments are practical, it is                first necessary to measure electric polarizabilities and                        lifetimes of a pair of metastable levels of opposite nominal                    parity.  This may lead to a major effort to search for the                      electric dipole moment of the electron in dysprosium.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, THE
